concept.title: Kafka Producer
concept.shortdesc: The Kafka Producer passes data to a Kafka cluster. The Kakfa Producer can pass data to Kafka as delimited, log, or JSON data.

conbody.p: When you configure a Kafka Producer, you configure the brokers, topic, partition strategy, and payload type to use. You can add additional Kafka configuration properties as needed.
The Kafka Producer passes data to partitions in the Kafka topic based on the partition strategy that you choose.
